title: Portfolio Intro
description: This portfolio belongs to Himanshu Pal, a dedicated Full Stack Web Developer from Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh. He completed BCA from Maharaja Agrasen Himalayan Garhwal University and specializes in building modern, responsive web apps using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Education
description: Himanshu Pal has completed his Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) from Maharaja Agrasen Himalayan Garhwal University, focusing on software development, data structures, and modern web technologies.

title: Profession
description: Himanshu Pal is a passionate Web Developer experienced in building scalable, user-friendly web applications with React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, and databases like MongoDB and SQL.

title: Technical Skills
description: Proficient in JavaScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, and Clerk Authentication. Also experienced in REST APIs, vector databases, and AI integrations.

title: LinkedIn
description: linkedin.com/in/himanshu-pal01 â€” Himanshu actively shares projects, insights, and development experiences here.

title: Personal Project
description: Developed 'WorldAtlas', a web app built using React, Axios, React Router, CSS, Tailwind, and Clerk (Auth). Users can explore country data with an intuitive interface. Code available on GitHub: https://github.com/bobby16112004/WorldAtlas

title: Career Objective
description: To build impactful, efficient, and visually appealing web applications that merge creativity with logic. Himanshu aims to constantly learn, innovate, and contribute to the modern web ecosystem.
